    • Method Detail

      • createObjectInputStream

        protected java.io.ObjectInputStream createObjectInputStream(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                                                     throws java.io.StreamCorruptedException,
                                                            java.io.IOException
        A hook for creating an ObjectInputStream when attempting to deserialize the underlying object.

        This implementation just returns new ObjectInputStream(inputStream).

        Parameters:
        inputStream - the stream which holds the object representation
        Returns:
        a valid object input stream, which will be used when deserializing the object
        Throws:
        java.io.StreamCorruptedException
        java.io.IOException

      • createObjectOutputStream

        protected java.io.ObjectOutputStream createObjectOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        A hook for creating an ObjectOutputStream when attempting to serialize the underlying object.

        This implementation just returns new ObjectOutputStream(outputStream).

        Parameters:
        outputStream - the stream which will hold the object representation
        Returns:
        a valid object object stream, which will be used when serializing the object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
